article.headline: Southern Miss 59, Hampton 57
article.story: ROCK HILL, S.C. (AP) -- Charles Gaines scored 21 points and Southern Miss fought back from a 13-point deficit to beat Hampton 59-57 on Friday night in the Brother's Air & Heat Shootout. The Eagles (3-1) will face Samford (2-2) in the championship round. The Bulldogs won 66-64 over Winthrop (3-2) on Friday. Hampton jumped out to a 33-25 lead at halftime after Southern Miss missed six free throws. The Pirates extended the lead to 43-30 in the second half before the Eagles started a 6-0 run on Gaines' three baskets. Gaines' 3-pointer pulled Southern Miss to 49-46 with 6:29 left. David Haywood's 3-pointer with 5:23 remaining gave Southern Miss its first lead since the first half. The Eagles led by as many as six in the final minutes. Dante Stiggers added 12 points and Greg Johnson had 11 for Southern Miss. Gaines pulled down 13 rebounds. Southern Miss improved its second half shooting to 42.2 percent from 34.8 percent in the first half, while the Pirates shot 35.2 percent for the game. The Eagles also hit 10-of-11 free throws in the second half. Devin Green scored 21 of 25 points in the first half to lead Hampton. David Johnson added 9.
